mapper.select: SELECT cc.CLUB_NAME, ccs.STUD_ID, cs.STUD_NAME , ccs.CLUB_STUD_GRADE , ccs.CLUB_NO, ccs.CLUB_STUD_NO FROM CBH_STUD cs , CBH_CLUB_STUD ccs , CBH_CLUB cc WHERE ccs.CLUB_NO = cc.CLUB_NO AND cs.STUD_ID = ccs.STUD_ID AND CLUB_STUD_STATE = '활동중' AND ccs.STUD_ID = #{stud_id} AND (ccs.CLUB_STUD_GRADE = '대표' OR ccs.CLUB_STUD_GRADE = '화계')
